workPositions.description:
Responsible for maintaining a microservice backend system, handling production issues by checking sentries and Developing a Parkee application to make it easier for users, create memberships for tenants or users, pay bills, etc. Here I made an application where the parkee application can be used directly for a user (B2C) or for a tenant (B2B) to make the parkee app can help users to overcome problems finding a parking space, or problems with the parking system.

- Collaborate with field personnel to integrate a support system accessible through the Parkee app.
- Develop features to enable the Parkee app to support bill payments for electricity, mobile top-ups, data packages, and water bills by integrating with new third-party systems.
- Continuously improve existing features to align with user needs, incorporating insights from field experiences.
- Integrate new systems from third-party providers, such as banks and payment gateways, with the internal systems to enhance functionality.
- Assist the internal finance team by providing necessary data for financial reporting and support the marketing team by supplying data for analysis.

Tech Stack: Java Spring Boot, PostgreSQL

- Full Stack Developer, develop and maintain web API using .NET Core.
- Develop Form Permohonan ijazah using CI/CD and MVC architecture.
- Develop Form Pembicara External using .NET Core and Linq Entity Framework for API and .Net Freamework for frontend application.

- Develop and maintain binusmaya using PHP, codeigniter framework.
- Develop new feature for S3 Scoring for binusmaya Application.
- Develop embedded system for Binus Online.
- Full Stack Developer, develop and maintain binusmaya application.

Tech Stack : PHP, codeigniter framework, ajax and jquery.

Full Stack Developer
- Develop and Maintain Web API using .NET Framework 4.6
- Develop and Maintain Competency Test Website using .NET Framework
- Develop new feature using .NET Framework, MongoDB
- Develop simple authentication & SSO using .NET Core
